pages.text: The $(major)Emerald Heart$(0) Gene causes entities to $(minor)drop an Emerald upon death$(0).$(br2)For players, this has a configurable cooldown, with the default being 60 seconds.$(br2)This Gene $(minor)can be given to mobs$(0).
By default, you can get this gene from the following mobs:$(br)$(li)Villager
